title: Analysis of Bacterial Coinfections in Patients with Mild, Moderate, and Severe COVID-19.
abstract: This study aimed to analyze the clinical features and infection status of COVID-19 patients with bacterial infections in Shaanxi Province. A retrospective analysis was conducted on 2,000 hospitalized patients from December 2022 to February 2023, categorized into mild, moderate, and severe COVID-19 groups. Among these, 300 patients had bacterial coinfections, with
